{"id":494319207,"lang":"java","time":"2 months, 1 week","timestamp":1621234545,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"5 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/494319207/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Island Perimeter","memory":"40.6 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int islandPerimeter(int[][] grid) {\n        if(grid==null || grid.length==0 || grid[0].length==0)\n            return 0;\n        \n        int result=0;\n        for(int i=0;i<grid.length;i++)\n        {\n            for(int j=0;j<grid[i].length;j++)\n            {\n                if(grid[i][j]==1)\n                {\n                    result+=4;\n                    if(i>0 && grid[i-1][j]==1)\n                        result-=2;\n                    \n                    if(j>0 && grid[i][j-1]==1)\n                        result-=2;\n                    \n                }\n            }\n        }\n        \n        return result;\n        \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"island-perimeter"}
